comment: It sucks, when I've tried to use it. It says no network or network not available. What good is that?

title: Citibiker Must Have!

author: Benjamin Chan
comment: The app finally works and it is in the simplest format.

reply.author: Peter Janak
reply.content: Hey Benjamin - sorry you had trouble opening the app. I just published an update (version 2.0.6) that should fix the problem. If you're still interested, give it a shot after the update and let me know how it goes!

title: App doesn't work

comment: It's straightforward to use, quickly finds bikes/stations nearby, and looks great!
title: Excellent
